text: "Lady (You Bring Me Up)" is a 1981 song by the Commodores and taken from their ninth studio album In the Pocket. It was nominated for a Grammy Award in 1982. It went to number 1 in New Zealand, number 8 in the United States, number 15 in the Netherlands, number 17 in Belgium, number 27 in Canada and number 34 in Australia. ==Track listings== 7" single #"Lady (You Bring Me Up)" – 4:46 #"Gettin' It" – 4:18 Category:1981 songs Category:Commodores songs
title: Lady (You Bring Me Up)
